newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnlines says has option to up BTL stake.
newsitem.headline: Finnlines says has option to up BTL stake.

text.p: Finnish cargo shipping group Finnlines Oy said in a statement on Monday it had an option to increase its ownership in Swedish firm BTL to 45.03 percent of votes from 24.84 percent.
Finnlines said it had an option to buy Swedish AB Catena's shares in Bilspedition Transport & Logistics AB.
"Catena has given Finnlines the right, under the terms of an option agreement valid until March 31, 1997, to acquire all shares in ... BTL owned by Catena," Finnlines said.

If this option -- together with a deal reached on October 3 with Swedish firm Walleniusrederierna AB -- were exercised, Finnlines' ownership in BTL would rise to 31.20 percent of BTL's shares from 20.81 percent, it said.
